[general]
path=/home/user/
output_folder_name=NGSphy_output
ploidy=1
[data]
inputmode=4
simphy_folder_path=testSimphy
simphy_data_prefix=data
simphy_filter=true
[coverage]
[coverage]
experiment=F:100
individual=LN:1.2,1
locus=LN:1.3,1
offtarget=0.25, 0.01 # 25% loci are off-target, will have 1% of the coverage
notcaptured=0.5
taxon= 1,0.5;2:0.25
[ngs-reads-art]
amp=true
l=100
m=250
p=true
q=true
s=50
sam=true
ss=HS20
[execution]
environment = bash
run = on
threads=4
